mapper.select: SELECT qnaId,category,title,member_userId AS userId,status,insertDatetime FROM QnABoard WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY insertDatetime DESC

SELECT b.bookId, b.title, b.content, b.matchType, b.level, b.status, b.bookDate, b.bookTime, b.insertDatetime, b.teamGender, l.locationId, l.stadiumName, m.userId
FROM book b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN location l ON b.location_locationId = l.locationId WHERE b.status = #{status} ORDER BY b.insertDatetime DESC

SELECT b.bookId, b.title, b.content, b.matchType, b.level, b.status, b.bookDate, b.bookTime, b.insertDatetime, b.teamGender, l.locationId, l.stadiumName, m.userId
FROM book b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.member_userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN location l ON b.location_locationId = l.locationId WHERE b.status = #{status} AND (b.bookDate >= CURRENT_DATE) ORDER BY b.insertDatetime DESC
SELECT COUNT(visitDate) FROM Visit WHERE visitDate = CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book WHERE status = 0 AND (bookDate >= CURRENT_DATE)

SELECT v.visitDate AS date, COUNT(distinct v.visitId) AS visitCount, COUNT(distinct b.bookId) AS bookedCount, COUNT(distinct q.qnaId) AS qnaCount FROM Visit v LEFT JOIN book b ON DATE(b.insertDatetime) = v.visitDate LEFT JOIN QnABoard q ON DATE(q.insertDatetime) = v.visitDate GROUP BY v.visitDate
